comments.author: StackItUp
comments.body: Lovely coins ! Won the set in the past auction and thought that it would be nice to share this picture with you all  StackBTC

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I am confused - are the coins solid silver? or silver plated? the OP seems to suggest both? Is one solid silver and the other silver plated?

comments.author: Cyrus
comments.body: One silver and one silver plated, at least that's my understanding from the OP:(the diameter of the first one is written twice)Quote from: raritycheck on November 24, 2023, 09:25:40 PMSilverMetal: .999 Fine Pure Silver Diameter: 34.9mm    Weight: 24 grams   (0.85 Oz)Diameter: 34.9 mm Engraved serial number: No Quantity: Limited to 100 Quote from: raritycheck on November 24, 2023, 09:25:40 PMAlloy:Material: Zinc AlloyPlating:  Silver Finish: ProofDiameter 34.9 mm Engraved serial number: NoQuantity: Limited to 200Quote from: raritycheck on November 24, 2023, 09:25:40 PMThere are three lots:Lot 1- Pair of silver and alloy  Lot 2- Pair of silver and alloy  Lot 3- Pair of silver and alloy
